metadata.dc:author: Calvete Oliva, Antonio
metadata.dc:description: This study is aimed at providing information concerning the provisions adopted by the European Union on both a compulsory and non-compulsory basis for its member States related in one way or another to the fight against smoking. To this end, a review is made of all of the provisions published in the Official Journal of the European Union as of the first published in 1986 up to March 2005, commenting upon the aspects of each provision having to do with the subject stated above.
metadata.dc:title: Actividad de la Uni√≥n Europea en materia de lucha contra el tabaquismo.
[European Union fight against smoking related activitiy].
